hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Lobby.item: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Piece of Heart#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path of #gold#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #a Water Temple Small Key Ring# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Prelude of Light#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that plundering #Goron City# is a foolish choice.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides a #generic grotto#.
